data.eml:eml: Observations on the quill mites (Acari: Syringophilidae) from charadriiform birds

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skoracki, Maciej, Dabert, Jacek, Schmäschke, Ronald (2006): Observations on the quill mites (Acari: Syringophilidae) from charadriiform birds. Zootaxa 1156: 51-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172288
